sentences.en: A tapering extension of land projecting into water; a peninsula, cape, or promontory.
sentences.cn: 角，岬，半岛：伸入水中的一块逐渐变得尖细的陆地；半岛、角或岬。

sentences.en: Add up tapering reel and realize zero - piece coiling with great taper.
sentences.cn: 增设卷锥筒装置,实现大锥度的零件卷制.
目前,伤亡人数在逐渐减少.

sentences.en: Drag onto the page, then right - click to set tapering factor.
sentences.cn: 拖到绘图页上, 然后右击可设置斜削系数.

sentences.en: Drag onto the page. Right - click to edit tapering factor and shaft length.
sentences.cn: 拖到绘图页上. 右击可编辑斜削系数和轴长.

sentences.en: Ears - Erect, firm, and of medium size, tapering slightly to a rounded point.
sentences.cn: 立耳, 坚实, 中等大小, 尖端略细,末端为圆弧形.

sentences.en: Her foot pointed artfully toward tapering shoes.
sentences.cn: 她的脚巧妙地伸向了前端尖细的鞋子里。

sentences.en: Her foot pointed artfully toward tapering toes.
sentences.cn: 她的脚巧妙地伸向了前端尖细的鞋子里.

sentences.en: His hands were on the large side , with long, tapering fingers.
sentences.cn: 他的手相当大, 手指修长, 尖细.

sentences.en: If his writing appears predominantly thread-like, unwinding or tapering towards the end of letters and words, then you better be careful.
sentences.cn: 如果他的字迹是明显的线状、舒展或字母单词的尖端细长，那你最好要小心点了。

sentences.en: Interest in the scandal seems to be tapering off.
sentences.cn: 人们对那件丑闻的兴趣似乎越来越小了.
非生产性开支一直在下降.

sentences.en: TAIL: long, wide at base, and tapering. Fur long and flowing.
sentences.cn: 尾巴: 很长, 很粗的基部, 向上逐渐变细, 长满了蓬松的长毛.

sentences.en: The main stem of a tree is a tapering geometricsolid.
sentences.cn: 树木的主干是一种有消度的几何体.

sentences.en: The number of applicants for the course has been tapering off recently.
sentences.cn: 申请上该课程的人近来已逐渐减少.

sentences.en: There are signs that inflation is tapering.
sentences.cn: 种种迹象显示，通货膨胀率在逐渐下降。

sentences.en: Well, the leg shall be tapering all down the side seam.
sentences.cn: 喔, 裤腿应该沿边缝逐渐收小.
